API Reference
=============

This section provides an overview of the public API exposed by
Q-Materialise.  The functions and classes listed here are the
primary building blocks for applying and customising styles.  Refer to
the source code for further details; the docstrings are comprehensive
and include examples wherever appropriate.

.. automodule:: q_materialise
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

.. automodule:: q_materialise.style
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

.. automodule:: q_materialise.utils
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

.. automodule:: q_materialise.colors
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
